org.apache.ambari.server.stack

Class ServiceDirectory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.StackDefinitionDirectory
      • org.apache.ambari.server.stack.ServiceDirectory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CommonServiceDirectory, StackServiceDirectory

    public abstract class ServiceDirectory
extends StackDefinitionDirectory
    Encapsulates IO operations on a stack definition service directory.
